Name

Crit Effect

Type
Clocked! Triple damage. The target is knocked prone.

Bludgeoning
Head Shot Triple damage. The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or die.

Piercing
From chops to Groin Triple damage. The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or die.

Slashing
Doomed! The target is slowed 1 for 1 round, and is also doomed 1.

Bomb or Spell
